projects.title: Chat Website
projects.description: A web-based social networking platform where you could - send DMs, create groups messages - anything you could do in WhatsApp Web. The app is built using HTML, CSS and JS. It uses a Python Flask backend, with MongoDB Atlas as the database.

projects.title: Credit Risk Modelling
projects.description: Built a Credit Risk Model in partnership with American Express, as part of IITM coursework. Explored various ML models including Logistic Regression, Random Forest, XGBoost. Achieved 75% test accuracy for the prediction of the loan default likelihood by tuning a LightGBM model.

projects.title: Music Genre Classifier
projects.description: Designed a Neural Net that classifies audio files to 10 genres, using a training dataset of 10k audio files. Achieved 91% test accuracy on predicting music genre on tuning a CNN model with 11 layers for 30 epochs.

projects.title: Fruit Ninja - Desktop
projects.description: Imeplemented a desktop video game inspired by the popular mobile game ‘Fruit Ninja’. Developed the game using python’s Pygame library to deploy – Graphics, Game Controls, Sound Effects

projects.title: Portfolio Optimization
projects.description: Conceptualized and implemented a workflow to pull the latest stock data from NSE, calculate the returns and find the best performing stocks depending on the given duration, and gives us the list of stocks to invest in. Heavily uses multi-threading to process vast quantities of time-series data.
